bibl.title: Excavations in Area C at Ismant el-Kharab in 1996-1997.
bibl.note: Area C consists of 2 mounds separated by a low depression. Structures from the 1st-3rd centuries.

bibl.title: Dakhleh Oasis Project: Preliminary Reports on the 1994-1995 to 1998-1999 Field Seasons

bibl.seg: HICKSON Kevin, Excavations in Area C at Ismant el-Kharab in 1996-1997.

Colin A. HOPE and Gillian E. BOWEN (Edd.), Dakhleh Oasis Project: Preliminary Reports on the 1994-1995 to 1998-1999 Field Seasons = Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph No. 11 (Oxford - Oakville, Connecticut, 2002) pp. 157-166, 5 figg., 3 plans.
Area C consists of 2 mounds separated by a low depression. Structures from the 1st-3rd centuries.
